data.title: Best bar in The Town!!
data.text:
What can I say, great service from friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff. Ate there twice, very happy both times, Asian noodle salad a good surprise.
I love my ales and there were enough options to keep me quiet for four days. Some of the finest craft ales around, don't miss out.

data.title: Solid spot for craft beers!
data.text: I had a casual dinner here with friends and liked the craft beer selection.  The atmosphere is lively, service is very friendly and the eats are good (sandwiches and such).  The downtown location is great if you're planning to do a little walking or bar hopping in the area.

data.title: Fun unique food & drinks
data.text: One of our favorite lunch spots downtown. Good unique food (love the turkey pita and hummus plate), art that rotates, and great craft beer selection. Reasonable prices and very nice staff.

data.title: My favorite in Fort Wayne
data.text:
Fort Wayne doesn't have very many original places like this. Actually , it's my favorite place to meet friends have a light dinner and enjoy a glass or two of wine in this town. 
Local art that is always rotating, local live music and a excellent wine and beer selection. Not to mention very personable service and unique  ambience.
